g.text: Note: Frontend is served by a service based on ReactJS (server-side and client-side)
This service is not represented here as an actor because its sole purpose is
to provide the client to the user's browser
The In-Browser ReactJS frontend actor regroups server-side and client-side
But JS code is exectued client-side, so it should be the client address that is sent
to the DB and not the frontend server address
INSERT INTO users (name, ip, port) VALUES ("name", ip, port) RETURNING id;
UPDATE users SET ip = ip, port = port WHERE id = 3265;
Select user "other" from list with id 3103
INSERT INTO messages (source, destination, body, time) VALUES (3265,3103,"Hello",time) RETURNING id;
SELECT ip, port FROM users WHERE id = 3265;
(if current chatting session is with user "other")
UPDATE users SET ip = 0.0.0.0 and port = 0 WHERE id = 3265;
